description:
Efforts to slash bills and save the planet by retrofitting insulation in Britain's homes are rotting roofs and devaluing properties. UnHerd's Aris Roussinos explains why.

The post Why Modern British Homes Are Getting Mouldy appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Why Modern British Homes Are Getting Mouldy

description:
The US Supreme Court has unanimously revived the NRA's lawsuit against a former New York official accused of strong-arming banks into cutting ties with the organisation.

title: U.S. Supreme Court Reignites NRA Battle Over Free Speech Rights

description:
Net Zero should be tackled with the same urgency and speed as the race for a Covid vaccine, says former Chief Scientific Adviser Sir Patrick Vallance.

title: Net Zero Race As Urgent as Covid Vaccine Hunt: Sir Patrick Vallance

description:
Clinical trials can't save lives if results stay hidden, warns Dr Maggie Cooper. UK regulations must enforce full transparency to build public trust and ensure patient safety.

The post An Urgent Call for Transparency in Clinical Trials appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: An Urgent Call for Transparency in Clinical Trials

description:

description:

description:
Regardless of how much your house is worth or where you live, you can still fall victim to a thug wielding a zombie knife. How delightfully egalitarian Britain has become.

The post Hackney May Have a Desirable Postcode but You Can Still Be Mugged There at Knife-Point appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Hackney May Have a Desirable Postcode but You Can Still Be Mugged There at Knife-Point
